00031 #include <vector>
00032 #include "../common/common.h"
00033 #include "../common/experiment.h"
00034 #include "../common/dei.h"

00036 using namespace std;
00037 
00038 
00040 struct clargs {
00041   Path command;               
00042   DEIprocess::Component contrast; 
00043   Path Mlistname;                               
00044   Path Plistname;                               
00045   DEIoptions deiopt;            
00046   string slicedesc;                             
00047   Path outmask;                         
00048   bool beverbose;                               
00049   bool SaveInt;                                 
00050 
00052   clargs(int argc, char *argv[]);
00053 };
00054 
00055 
00056 clargs::
00057 clargs(int argc, char *argv[]) : 
00058   beverbose(false),
00059   SaveInt(false),
00060   outmask("sino-<minus list>-@.tif"),
00061   contrast(DEIprocess::REF)
00062 {
00063 
00064   poptmx::OptionTable table
00065         ("Forms DEI-based sinogram(s).",
00066          "Performs following procedures:\n"
00067          "1) reads two text files describing the arrays of input files"
00068          " (foreground-background pairs) in minus and plus position of"
00069          " the analyzer crystal.\n"
00070          "2) removes the backgrounds in accordance with these files.\n"
00071          "3) performs the DEI extraction of the requested contrast component.\n"
00072          "4) constructs the sinograms of the slices requested in the slice string.");
00073 
00074   table
00075         .add(poptmx::NOTE, "ARGUMENTS:")
00076         .add(poptmx::ARGUMENT, &Mlistname, "minus list",
00077                  "List of the input images in the minus position.", "")
00078         .add(poptmx::ARGUMENT, &Plistname, "plus list",
00079          "List of the input images in the plus position.", "")
00080     .add(poptmx::NOTE,     "",
00081          "Arguments \"" + table.desc(&Mlistname) + "\""
00082                  " and \"" + table.desc(&Plistname) + "\". "
00083                  + AqSeries::Desc)
00084         .add(poptmx::ARGUMENT, &outmask, "result mask",
00085                  "Output result mask.", MaskDesc, outmask)
00086 
00087         .add(poptmx::NOTE, "OPTIONS:")
00088         .add(poptmx::OPTION, &contrast, 'C', "component",
00089                  "Type of the contrast component.",
00090                  "The component of the contrast to extract via the DEI method."
00091          " " + DEIprocess::componentDesc, toString(contrast))
00092         .add(poptmx::OPTION, &slicedesc, 's', "slice",
00093                  "Slices to be processed.", SliceOptionDesc, "<all>")
00094         .add(poptmx::OPTION, &SaveInt,'i', "int",
00095       "Output image(s) as integer.", IntOptionDesc)
00096     .add(deiopt.options())
00097     .add_standard_options(&beverbose)
00098         .add(poptmx::MAN, "SEE ALSO:", SeeAlsoList);
00099 
00100   if ( ! table.parse(argc,argv) )
00101         exit(0);
00102   if ( ! table.count() ) {
00103         table.usage();
00104         exit(0);
00105   }
00106 
00107   command = table.name();
00108 
00109   // <minus list> and <plus list> : required arguments.
00110   if ( ! table.count(&Mlistname) )
00111     exit_on_error(command, string () +
00112                                   "Missing required argument: "+table.desc(&Mlistname)+".");
00113   if ( ! table.count(&Plistname) )
00114     exit_on_error(command, string() +
00115                                   "Missing required argument: "+table.desc(&Plistname)+".");
00116 
00117 
00118   // <result mask> : one more argument may or may not exist
00119   if ( ! table.count(&outmask) )
00120         outmask = upgrade(Mlistname, "reconstructed-") + "-@.tif";
00121   if ( string(outmask).find('@') == string::npos )
00122         outmask = outmask.dtitle() + "-@" + outmask.extension();
00123 
00124 }
00125 
00126 
00127 
00129 int main(int argc, char *argv[]) {
00130 
00131   const clargs args(argc, argv);
00132   const AqSeries Mlist(args.Mlistname);
00133   const AqSeries Plist(args.Plistname);
00134   const DEIprocess proc(args.deiopt.Gm, args.deiopt.Gp, args.deiopt.Rm, args.deiopt.Rp);
00135   const DEIexp expr(proc, args.contrast, Mlist, Plist);
00136   int
00137     thetas=expr.thetas(),
00138     pixels=expr.pixels(),
00139     slices=expr.slices();
00140   const string sliceformat = mask2format(args.outmask, slices);
00141   const vector<int> sliceV = slice_str2vec(args.slicedesc, slices);
00142   const SinoS sins(expr, sliceV, args.beverbose);
00143 
00144   Map sinogram(thetas, pixels);
00145   ProgressBar bar(args.beverbose, "sinogram formation", sliceV.size());
00146 
00147   for (unsigned slice=0 ; slice < sliceV.size() ; slice++ ) {
00148         sins.sino(slice, sinogram);
00149         SaveImage( toString(sliceformat, sliceV[slice]+1), sinogram, args.SaveInt);
00150         bar.update();
00151   }
00152 
00153   exit(0);
00154 
00155 }
